answers.answer: I had it with my last n sometimes i would slowly swell n other time just all at once. Highest mine got was 157/100. Dr put me on bp pills take 2times a day n it helps. Last bp was 107/32.
Oh ok & how fat along were u when diagnosed with pre e? I've been having slow swelling as well as protein since 14 weeks. My bp is anywhere from 80/50-140/90. My bp on Tuesday was 130/75.
Mine was 166/100 , and i couldnt fit in shoes.

I don't have pre eclampsia but i did have high blood pressure one month and my feet were swollen like crazy. I believe I was 22-24 weeks. I think my bp was 130/100 or something near there. This week, it's 107/60
My next apt is in the 29th so I'm going to bring up the increased swelling and bp again.
I am 34wks and have carpal tunnel, severe swelling and high blood pressure since 27wks and they are watching me close and did blood and urine tests to see if i have preeclampsia
My tests came back i do have preeclampsia

question: With your swelling did it gradually increase or come all at once? How high was your bp?
title: Preeclampsia Q for those who had it
